existing_features.title: Improve the Home page visual theme so it is not overly light: increase contrast, introduce a cohesive finance/army-green palette (backgrounds, cards, headings, buttons), and ensure consistent typography and spacing across sections.

Fix layout collisions/overlaps on the Home page by auditing responsive breakpoints and spacing (especially hero overlays, section transitions, and card grids) so content never visually collides at common viewport sizes.

Enhance homepage animations to feel more like modern finance websites while remaining lightweight: add subtle section transitions, hover micro-interactions, and (where appropriate) animated accent elements; all animations must respect prefers-reduced-motion.

Add additional Home page content sections beyond the current limited set, inspired by finance marketing sites, including at minimum: (1) a customer savings/profit examples section with multiple example cards and figures, and (2) one additional credibility-oriented section (e.g., testimonials slider, FAQs, or stats/metrics).

Add finance-website-style 'celebrity' photo content using AI-generated, non-identifiable celebrity-style/brand-ambassador imagery (do not use real person likenesses) and integrate these images into one or more Home page sections in a visually coherent way.

Update the structured content source(s) used by the Home page so the new sections (profit/savings examples and additional credibility content) are content-driven (easy to edit) rather than hardcoded in multiple places.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add more data and features, including customer profit/savings examples
